setDate

public void setDate(java.lang.String _date)
Parameters:
_date - set for date sensitive searches YYYY-MM-DD ("2010-10-02")

setMaxItems

public void setMaxItems(int _maxItems)
Parameters:
_maxItems - maximum number of items to return

setSize

public void setSize(java.lang.String _mstb)
Parameters:
_mstb - s - small square 75x75
t - thumbnail, 100 on longest side
m - small, 240 on longest side
- - medium, 500 on longest side
b - large, 1024 on longest side (only exists for very large original images)
o - original image, either a jpg, gif or png, depending on source format

setPrivacy

public void setPrivacy(int _privacy)
Parameters:
_privacy - set privacy filter

1 - public photos
2 - private photos visible to friends
3 - private photos visible to family
4 - private photos visible to friends & family
5 - completely private photos

getRawFeed

public processing.data.XML getRawFeed(java.lang.String query,
                                      java.lang.String _method,
                                      java.lang.String tokens)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Parameters:
query - search criteria
_method - set method (FFlickrConstants) http://www.flickr.com/services/api/
tokens - additional url tokens that correspond to api method (i.e. method = INTERESTINGNESS tokens = "&date=2010-10-02&per_page=10&page=1") return the search as a raw XML
Returns:
xml
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
